com.events.web

Class WebHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.events.web.WebAccess
      • com.events.web.WebHelper

  • public class WebHelper
extends WebAccess
    The Class WebHelper class holds all the methods that communicate with server API and parses the results in required Java Bean classes.
